00041     public $Model= 'pf';

00044     {

00052     function FormatDate($date)
00053     {
00054         global $MonthNames;
00055 
00056         return $MonthNames[$date['Month']].' '.$date['Day'];
00057     }

00063     function PrintStatusForm()
00064     {
00065         global $Modules, $IMG_PATH, $ADMIN, $HeadStart, $StartLine, $StateCount, $LinesPerPage, $SearchRegExp;
00066 
00067         if ($running= $this->Controller($output, 'IsRunning')) {
00068             $imgfile= 'run.png';
00069             $name= 'Running';
00070             $info= _TITLE('is running');
00071             $confirm= _NOTICE('Are you sure you want to stop the <NAME>?');
00072             $button= 'Stop';
00073         }
00074         else {
00075             $imgfile= 'stop.png';
00076             $name= 'Stopped';
00077             $info= _TITLE('is not running');
00078             $confirm= _NOTICE('Are you sure you want to start the <NAME>?');
00079             $button= 'Start';
00080         }
00081         $confirm= preg_replace('/<NAME>/', _($Modules[$this->Model]['Name']), $confirm);
00082         ?>
00083         <table id="status">
00084             <tr>
00085                 <td class="image">
00086                     <img src="<?php echo $IMG_PATH.$imgfile ?>" name="<?php echo $name ?>" alt="<?php echo $name ?>" border="0">
00087                 </td>
00088                 <td>
00089                     <form action="<?php echo $_SERVER['PHP_SELF'] ?>" method="post">
00090                         <strong><?php echo _($Modules[$this->Model]['Name'])." $info " ?></strong>
00091                         <?php
00093                         if (in_array($_SESSION['USER'], $ADMIN)) {
00094                             ?>
00095                             <input type="submit" name="<?php echo $button ?>" value="<?php echo _($button) ?>" onclick="return confirm('<?php echo $confirm ?>')"/>
00096                             <?php
00097                         }
00098                         ?>
00099                         <input type="hidden" name="Model" value=<?php echo $this->Model ?> />
00100                     </form>
00101                 </td>
00102             </tr>
00103         </table>
00104         <?php
00105     }
00106 
00109     function PrintStatesTable()
00110     {
00111         global $HeadStart, $StartLine, $StateCount, $LinesPerPage, $SearchRegExp;
00112 
00113         PrintLogHeaderForm($StartLine, $StateCount, $LinesPerPage, $SearchRegExp, '');
00114         $this->Controller($output, 'GetStateList', $HeadStart, $LinesPerPage, $SearchRegExp);
00115         $output= unserialize($output[0]);
00116 
00117         $total= count($output);
00118         if ($total > 0) {
00119             ?>
00120             <table id="processes">
00121             <?php
00122             $this->PrintStatesTableHeader();
00123             $linenum= 0;
00124             foreach ($output as $cols) {
00125                 $class= ($linenum++ % 2 == 0) ? 'evenline' : 'oddline';
00126                 ?>
00127                 <tr class="<?php echo $class ?>">
00128                     <td>
00129                         <?php echo $linenum + $StartLine ?>
00130                     </td>
00131                     <?php
00132                     $count= 1;
00133                     foreach ($cols as $c) {
00134                         if (in_array($count, array(5, 6, 7))) {
00135                             // Center a state, age, exp
00136                             $class= 'class="center"';
00137                         }
00138                         else if (in_array($count, array(1, 2, 3, 4))) {
00139                             // Left align pr, dir, src, dest
00140                             $class= 'class="left"';
00141                         }
00142                         else {
00143                             $class= '';
00144                         }
00145                         ?>
00146                         <td <?php echo $class ?>>
00147                             <?php echo $c ?>
00148                         </td>
00149                         <?php
00150                         $count++;
00151                     }
00152                     ?>
00153                 </tr>
00154                 <?php
00155             }
00156             ?>
00157             </table>
00158             <?php
00159         }
00160     }
00161 
00166     function PrintStatesTableHeader()
00167     {
00168         ?>
00169         <tr id="processes">
00170             <th><?php echo _('Line') ?></th>
00171             <th><?php echo _('Proto') ?></th>
00172             <th><?php echo _('Dir') ?></th>
00173             <th><?php echo _('Source') ?></th>
00174             <th><?php echo _('Dest') ?></th>
00175             <th><?php echo _('State') ?></th>
00176             <th><?php echo _('Age') ?></th>
00177             <th><?php echo _('Expr') ?></th>
00178             <th><?php echo _('Packets') ?></th>
00179             <th><?php echo _('Bytes') ?></th>
00180         </tr>
00181         <?php
00182     }
